name: ponce
content:
ponce noun [C]
(CRIMINAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK slang a man who controls prostitutes and takes a large part of the money that they earn for himself Synonym
pimp
ponce noun [C]
(MAN)
UK offensive a man who does not behave, dress, or speak in a traditionally male way, especially one who behaves in a very careful way: Don't be such a ponce! Pick the spider up - it won't hurt you! Related word
poncy
